description:
In order to save Manaka, Miuna is swallowed up by the whirpool that Ojoshi-sama made and is covered in Ena that wraps around her like a cocoon. Hikari and Tsumugu go to save her but are held back by the powers of a god.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La couleur de la mer, la couleur de la terre, la couleur du vent, la couleur de l’âme, ta couleur. Earth color of a calm
The Color of the Sea. The Color of the Earth. The Color of the Wind. The Color of Your Heart. Your Color. Earth Color of a Calm
Umi no Iro. Daichi no Iro. Kaze no Iro. Kokoro no Iro. Kimi no Iro. Earth Color of a Calm
海の色. 大地の色. 風の色. 心の色. 君の色. ~Earth color of a calm~
